languages.text: [Я вдыхаю эссенцию из праха и крови верных, просветляющую разум, дарующую благодать читать знаки Его]

traits.locale_text: [Я вдыхаю эссенцию из праха и крови верных, просветляющую разум, дарующую благодать читать знаки Его]

languages.text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]
languages.original_text: [Я вдыхаю эссенцию из праха и крови верных, просветляющую разум, дарующую благодать читать знаки Его]

traits.locale_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]
[I breathe in Shai'ri, the essence made of ashes and blood of the faithful that enlightens the mind, giving it grace to hear His voice and follow His ways.]

[I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

languages.text: [Ich atme die Essenz, die aus der Asche und dem Blut der Gläubigen besteht. Sie erleuchtet den Verstand, gewährt ihm die Gnade, Seine Zeichen zu lesen]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

traits.locale_text: [Ich atme die Essenz, die aus der Asche und dem Blut der Gläubigen besteht. Sie erleuchtet den Verstand, gewährt ihm die Gnade, Seine Zeichen zu lesen]

languages.text: [Respiro la esencia creada a partir de las cenizas y la sangre de los fieles. Aclara la mente y proporciona la gracia de leer Sus señales]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

traits.locale_text: [Respiro la esencia creada a partir de las cenizas y la sangre de los fieles. Aclara la mente y proporciona la gracia de leer Sus señales]

languages.text: [私は信者たちの灰と血から作られたエッセンスを吸い込む。それは心を啓発し、主の兆しを読む恩寵を授けてくれる。]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

traits.locale_text: [私は信者たちの灰と血から作られたエッセンスを吸い込む。それは心を啓発し、主の兆しを読む恩寵を授けてくれる。]

languages.text: [我吸入了用信徒的骨灰与鲜血制成的精华。它能启迪心灵，使人聆听祂的声音，解读祂的启示]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

traits.locale_text: [我吸入了用信徒的骨灰与鲜血制成的精华。它能启迪心灵，使人聆听祂的声音，解读祂的启示]

languages.text: [Je respire l'essence tirée du sang et des cendres des fidèles. Il éclaire l'esprit pour lui permettre de comprendre Ses signes.]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]

traits.locale_text: [Je respire l'essence tirée du sang et des cendres des fidèles. Il éclaire l'esprit pour lui permettre de comprendre Ses signes.]

languages.text: [İnançlıların küllerinden ve kanından oluşan esansı içime çekiyorum. Zihnimi aydınlatarak bana O'nun işaretlerini okuma lütfunu bahşediyor.]
languages.original_text: [I breathe in essence made from the ashes and blood of the faithful. It enlightens the mind, granting it the grace of reading His signs]
